alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Grainger; Hamblen; Jefferson; Union (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 12 at 1:51PM CDT until September 12 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Claiborne County in east Tennessee... North central Jefferson County in east Tennessee... Grainger County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Union County in east Tennessee... West central Hamblen County in east Tennessee... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 251 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maynardville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jefferson City, Maynardville, Rutledge, Plainview, Luttrell, Thorn Hill, Panther Creek State Park, Joppa, Rose Hill, and Buffalo Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
